prompt: <description>Part 1: Rectangular Prism with a Cylindrical Hole The first part is a rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. The hole is slightly larger than the width of the prism, and the prism has a flat top and bottom. Sketching the Base of the Prism 1. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the Euler Angles set to [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and the Translation Vector set to [0.0, 0.2658, 0.0]. 2. Draw a rectangle as face 1 and create two loops. Loop 1 starts with line 1 from (0.0, 0.4408) to (0.1432, 0.0), line 2 from (0.1432, 0.0) to (0.6068, 0.0), line 3 from (0.6068, 0.0) to (0.75, 0.4408), and line 4 from (0.75, 0.4408) to (0.375, 0.7133), followed by line 5 back to the starting point (0.0, 0.4408). 3. For Loop 2, create six connecting lines from (0.1908, 0.319) to (0.2829, 0.1595), (0.2829, 0.1595) to (0.4671, 0.1595), (0.4671, 0.1595) to (0.5592, 0.319), (0.5592, 0.319) to (0.4671, 0.4785), (0.4671, 0.4785) to (0.2829, 0.4785), and (0.2829, 0.4785) back to the starting point (0.1908, 0.319). Extruding the Sketch 1. Set the extrusion depth towards the normal to 0.2658 and the opposite normal to 0.0. 2. Apply a 0.75 scale factor to the sketch during extrusion. 3. Perform the 'New Body Feature Operation' to create the first part of the final shape. 4. After completing this part, proceed to build the next part of the assembly. The dimensions of the intermediate part are as follows: - Length: 0.75 - Width: 0.2658 - Height: 0.75</description>
completion:

{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,-90.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.2658,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.4408],"End Point":[0.1432,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.1432,0.0],"End Point":[0.6068,0.0]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.6068,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.4408]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.4408],"End Point":[0.375,0.7133]},"line_5":{"Start Point":[0.375,0.7133],"End Point":[0.0,0.4408]}},"loop_2":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.1908,0.319],"End Point":[0.2829,0.1595]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.2829,0.1595],"End Point":[0.4671,0.1595]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.4671,0.1595],"End Point":[0.5592,0.319]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.5592,0.319],"End Point":[0.4671,0.4785]},"line_5":{"Start Point":[0.4671,0.4785],"End Point":[0.2829,0.4785]},"line_6":{"Start Point":[0.2829,0.4785],"End Point":[0.1908,0.319]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.2658,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
